Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Presentation of the Lord Christ in the Temple:

Text.Language: All/louia: all/louia. I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V] afse e~qoun e~piervei: all/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia, Alleluia. Jesus Christ, the Son of God, entered into the temple. Alleluia, Alleluia.
الليلويا الليلويا يسوع المسيح ابن الله دخل الى الهيكل الليلويا الليلويا
